name: Line
description: Line segment defined by two points.

name: Rectangle
description: Rectangular area defined by a location and size.

name: Ellipse
description: Elliptical area defined by a center and size.

name: Polyline
description: A connected series of line segments.

name: Polygon
description: Polygonal area defined by a series of line segments.

name: Path
description: Complex area defined by a series of drawing commands.

name: Embedded Model
description: Model contained in another model as an embedded resource.

name: Referenced Model
description: Model contained in another model as an externally referenced resource.

name: Colors
description: Colors used for stroking and filling elements.

name: Named Colors
description: Well known colors defined by name.

name: Transforms
description: Linear affine transformation for altering the visual appearance of elements.
